sentence: On the Republican side, Dave White raised $1.8 million, Bill McSwain raised $1.4 million, Jake Corman raised $590,000, Lou Barletta raised $431,000 and Doug Mastriano raised $373,000.
title: Crypto's campaign year

sentence: Republicans have already elevated candidates like State Senator Doug Mastriano, a far-right 2020 election denier who is the Republican nominee for governor in Pennsylvania.
title: Democrats Fight Headwinds in Georgia and Beyond: The Problem Is Reality
